title: These all AD comps are funny
body:
http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2007535306/34965871?tab=stats

Actually did more damage than Jinx that game

replies.body:
best part is basically every item having armor pen and armor items being shit because logic
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

> [{quoted}](name=IAMS4T4N,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=IATskB1E,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-11-13T02:00:30.390+0000)
>
> best part is basically every item having armor pen and armor items being shit because logic
> {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

Actually at full build I was damn near unkillable (Had 4.2k HP and about 440 armor). And I could solo any one of them, even Yasuo was killing himself on me lol.

Unless you were being sarcastic, in which case ignore this lol.

Lmao

Let's not get ahead of ourselves. 4 adcs is a bit too much.

Filthy casuals.

{{champion:42}} ADC/Mid
{{champion:110}} Mid/ADC
{{champion:67}} Top
{{champion:104}} Jungle
{{champion:22}} Support
Ikr? Tanks so useless against our 'ADC Overlords' amirite?
{{champion:33}} {{champion:44}} : You're funny. AD comps are really hard.
